text:
International scientific co-operation on #COVID19 has been a hallmark of the pandemic, with hundreds of clinical trials for drug & #vaccine candidates registered since early 2020.

Learn more in our 🆕 Science, Technology & Innovation Outlook 👉 https://t.co/sjYeKFcyv5 #OECDSTIO https://t.co/4zwKbXzRVp
